original_title: Léa Guerlin au Dortoir des filles
overview: Despite their young age, these five beautiful students are already well experienced in the subject of pleasure.  Léa, Sophie and their friends in uniform don't shy away from anything when it comes to sex. They use all their charms to seduce any older man who crosses their path, and have every intention of putting everything they have learnt this year at boarding school into practice, particularly when it comes to reaching orgasm...  No one can resist them, not even their strict housemaster, Mr Richard. Just watch how easily he gives in to their advances after catching them in the middle of an orgy of lesbian pleasure in their dormitory. How can you say no to such beautiful young women, so burning with desire?
tagline: So many things happen in the dormitory once the lights are off.
title: Léa Guerlin First Night in the Girls' Dormitory
